comment.author: 16333811@N00
comment._content: Visitors to this photo page are encouraged to comment on this image here and then add their research/insights/comments about this image to the Inauguration project at the Flickr Commons group. Thanks!

comment.author: 74471476@N08
comment._content: I used this image to illustrate an article I wrote about the Garfield inaugural: susanbarsy.com/2013/02/03/all-about-a-ball/ The article gives further particulars of the ball and talks about the limited photographic evidence documenting the ball itself. Fashions that women wore at the time are also discussed. Thank you for making these fine images available. Susan Barsy, PhD OUR POLITY
